detail_desc: Tie in patterned silk. Width 6.5 cm.
Ankle boots in imitation leather with open sides, adjustable straps and metal buckles. Linings and insoles in fabric made from cotton and recycled polyester. Chunky, patterned soles. Heel 5 cm.
Short top in jersey with a sheen. Long sleeves and a deep V-neck at the back with a knot detail at the hem.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, button fly and straight-cut legs that taper gently to the hem.
Shorts in an airy weave with covered elastication at the waist, a small frill trim at the top, detachable tie belt and concealed pockets in the side seams.
Straight-cut blouse in softly draping silk with a V-neck front and back, short cap sleeves and short slits in the sides.
Three hair grips and one pair of hoop earrings in metal decorated with plastic beads. Length of hair grips 5.5 cm to 8 cm. Size of earrings 4.5 cm.
Trainers in cotton with an elastic gore and elasticated lacing at the front. Cotton linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Cardigan in a cable-knit viscose blend with a round neckline, buttons down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short shorts in patterned lightweight sweatshirt fabric with wide covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, diagonal side pockets and rounded hems.
Glittery hair elastics with no metal clips.

Small shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with an imitation suede flap with a compartment and decoration on the front and magnetic fastener. Narrow shoulder strap at the top and card compartments inside. Lined. Size approx. 5x11x17 cm.
Short, V-neck dress in a viscose weave with short sleeves, buttons down the front and gathered seams at the waist and hem for added width. Unlined.
Ankle-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric. Regular waist with wide elastication and a key pocket in the waistband.
Chelsea boots in imitation leather with elastic gores in the sides and loops at the top. Fleece linings and insoles and chunky soles with a low heel.
Ankle boots in imitation leather with a double-layer shaft, lacing at the front and a welt seam around the soles. Felted fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Knee-length trenchcoat in a woven modal blend with notch lapels and 3/4-length sleeves with a tab and decorative button at the cuffs. Front pockets, a detachable tie belt at the waist, and slits in the sides. Unlined.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and covered elastication at the hems. Soft brushed inside.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details, a high waist, zip fly and button and super-skinny legs with raw-edge hems. Embrace – denim with a smart stretch function that moulds to the body for a comfortable, flattering silhouette.
Dress in a viscose crêpe weave with a V-neck, smocked seam under the bust and long sleeves with smocked cuffs. Unlined.
Short, tiered skirt in a crêpe weave. High waist with wide smocking, and a decorative lace trim and small frill trim at the top. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a ribbed boat neck and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Jersey-lined cargo trousers in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Side pockets, a flap back pocket with a hook and loop fastening and two flap leg pockets with a hook and loop fastening. Shaping seams at the knees and ribbed hems.
Chelsea boots with elastic gores in the sides, a loop at the back, fabric linings and insoles, and rubber soles. Heel 4 cm.
Top in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and short sleeves.
Double-layered blouse in airy chiffon with a V neck at the front and opening with a hook-and-eye fastener at the back of the neck. Long trumpet sleeves with pin-tucks at the cuffs.
Boots in imitation leather and imitation suede with lacing. Faux fur linings and insoles and rubber soles. Platform 3 cm.
Fitted top in a ribbed viscose blend with a collar, button placket and short sleeves.
Round-necked, long-sleeved top in stretch, cotton-blend jersey. Slim fit.
Top in soft, organic cotton jersey with short puff sleeves.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton jersey with a collar, button placket and slits in the sides.

Knee-length tunic woven in an airy cotton and viscose blend. Small, frilled collar, a V-shaped opening with ties at the neckline, short, wide raglan sleeves and gathered seams creating tiers at the hips and hem for added width. Unlined.
Henley shirt in slub jersey with a button placket and long sleeves with a tab and button.
Velour jacket with a motif front and back and a lined hood, zip down the front, pockets in the side seams and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Short, straight-cut dress in a crêpe weave with a round neckline and small opening at the back with a covered button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with an organza flounce on the inside of the shoulders to create a puff effect, and cuffs with covered buttons. Unlined.
Three necklaces made of different metal chains, the longest with a shell-shaped pendant. Adjustable length from 41-49.5, 44-52 cm and 47-55 cm.
5-pocket shorts in soft, stretch denim with a concealed drawstring at the waist, zip fly and button and straight legs.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Padded scarf in a soft weave with an all-over print on one side and solid colour on the other.
Moisturising lip balms with a watermelon and raspberry flavour. 2x2.8 g.
Slightly shorter jumper in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
T-shirts in soft, organic cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Wide top in a stretchy, fine knit with a lightly brushed finish. Small stand-up collar, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs, and a straight hem.

Sandals in scuba fabric with an adjustable foot strap and heel strap with hook and loop fastenings and a loop at the back. Embossed ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) insoles and chunky thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist, lacing at the sides and medium coverage at the back.
Hi-tops in patterned imitation leather with an adjustable hook and loop tab and elasticated lacing at the front, and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Top in soft, fine-knit cotton with a V-neck front and back and a narrow cut at the top.
Lined bikini top with no fasteners. Padded cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and elastication at the hem.
Soft jersey top in a relaxed fit with short sleeves.
Two-strand necklace of thin metal chains with metal pendants and plastic beads. Adjustable length approx. 38-45 cm.
Fully lined bikini top with a textured-stripe finish and underwired, moulded, padded cups that lift and shape. Ties at the back of the neck and a metal fastener at the back.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a ribbed funnel collar, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jumper knitted in soft velour yarn in a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Suit trousers in a linen weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, flap back pockets with a button and a concealed coin pocket. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.

Soft, non-wired bra in lace with adjustable shoulder straps and mesh-lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Wide elastic hem, and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and ribbed trim around the neckline.
Sports top in marled, fast-drying functional fabric with short raglan sleeves and visible seams.

Studio Collection. Straight-cut, single-breasted blazer in a wool blend containing shimmering metallic threads. Notch lapels, a chest pocket, large patch front pockets and a jetted inner pocket. Defined shoulders and extra-long sleeves with buttons at the cuffs. Double back vent. Lined. Studio Collection AW20 is a tribute to the rebellious, fearless individual who dares to break the mould – an individual who plays between the extremes and finds their style amongst the androgynous, eclectic and creative.
5-pocket trousers in washed superstretch twill with a regular waist, zip fly with a button and slim legs.
Dance leggings in microfibre with an elasticated waist.
Shopper in a cotton jacquard weave with two handles at the top, decorative tassels and two inner compartments, one with a zip. Lined. Size 12x30x40 cm.
Hat in a soft knit with a pompom on top, earflaps and ties under the chin. Fleece lining.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with an opening and ties at the back of the neck, long puff sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Trainers in grained imitation leather with a padded edge and lacing at the front. Imitation leather linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Sleeveless, knee-length dress in airy chiffon with narrow, braided shoulder straps and a racer back. Elasticated seam at the waist and a gently flared, asymmetric skirt. Jersey lining.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch, flexible denim for high comfort with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and straight hems.
Short skirt in a patterned crêpe weave with a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener in the side and a seam with gathers down one side. Lined.
Padded gilet with a detachable, lined hood, zip down the front and side pockets. Lined.
Metal earrings in various sizes and designs. Size from 1.5 cm to approx. 3 cm.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of trousers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric. Top with raglan sleeves, buttons down one side and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Trousers with wide foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems.
Wide shorts in a viscose crêpe weave with a concealed zip in one side.
Short, off-the-shoulder top in a crinkled plumeti chiffon weave with a flounce at the top, smocked bodice and long, wide sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.

Microfibre bra with decorative straps at the front and underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps and three pairs of hook-and-eye fasteners at the back.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist, and ribbed hems.
5-pocket trousers in stretch twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed denim with sparkly stones at the front. High waist, low crotch, button fly and straight legs.
Imitation leather sandals. Straps with adjustable fasteners and soft, moulded rubber soles.
Hat in a soft rib knit with an appliqué on the turned-up hem.

Shirt in soft, brushed cotton twill with a button-down collar, classic front, open chest pocket and yoke with a hanger at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Thin metal chain necklaces with shell-shaped pendants. Adjustable length, 47-56 cm and 54-62 cm.
